Package com.example.wellfed.recipe

Class RecipeDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.wellfed.recipe.RecipeDB
  • public class RecipeDB
extends java.lang.Object
    The RecipeDB class is used to store and retrieve recipe data from the Firebase Firestore database.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  RecipeDB.OnRecipeDone
      Interface for listeners with methods that are called upon adding a recipe is completed

    • Constructor Detail

      • RecipeDB

        public RecipeDB​(DBConnection connection)
        Create a RecipeDB object
        Parameters:
        connection - the database connection for the RecipeDB

    • Method Detail

      • addRecipe

        public void addRecipe​(Recipe recipe,
                      RecipeDB.OnRecipeDone listener)
        Adds a recipe to the Recipe collection in db and any ingredients not already in Recipe Ingredients. This method will set the Recipe id to the corresponding document id in the collection
        Parameters:
        recipe - A Recipe object we want to add to the collection of Recipes and whose id we want to set

      • addRecipeHelper

        public void addRecipeHelper​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> recipeMap,
                            java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>> ingredients,
                            Recipe recipe,
                            RecipeDB.OnRecipeDone listener)
        Helper function for adding a recipe to the database.
        Parameters:
        recipeMap - A hash map representing all of the data elements associated with a recipe
        ingredients - A list of hash maps representing all of data elements associated with ingredients inside of a recipe
        recipe - The recipe to be added to the database
        listener - A listener that will be notified when the database add is completed

      • getRecipe

        public void getRecipe​(java.lang.String id,
                      RecipeDB.OnRecipeDone listener)
        Retrieves a recipe from the Firebase Firestore database.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the recipe to retrieve
        listener - The listener that will be notified upon completion of the retrieval

      • updateRecipe

        public void updateRecipe​(Recipe recipe,
                         RecipeDB.OnRecipeDone listener)
        Updates a recipe in the Firebase Firestore database.
        Parameters:
        recipe - The recipe, which contains updated information from it's previous state
        listener - The listener to be notified after the database update is completed

      • delRecipe

        public void delRecipe​(java.lang.String id,
                      RecipeDB.OnRecipeDone listener)
        Deletes a recipe document with the id from the collection of recipes
        Parameters:
        id - The id of recipe document we want to delete
        listener - The listener to be notified after the database deletion is completed

      • getDocumentReference

        public com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference getDocumentReference​(java.lang.String id)
        Get the DocumentReference from Recipes collection for the given id
        Parameters:
        id - The String of the document in Recipes collection we want
        Returns:
        DocumentReference of the Recipe

      • getQuery

        public com.google.firebase.firestore.Query getQuery()
        Gets the collection that the RecipeDB is associated with.
        Returns:
        the collection as a Query

        public com.google.firebase.firestore.Query getSortQuery​(java.lang.String field)
